dsgvo_description: GDPR consent for this chat. Commands: info, agree, refuse.
dsgvo_language_hint: ğŸŒ You can change the language for this chat with !language <de|en>.
dsgvo_text:
ğŸ“‹ *GDPR Information*
_Your data protection â€“ short & clear!_

ğŸ”¹ *Controller:*
  NishiBot (Owner: Max Mustermann)

ğŸ”¹ *Data types:*
  â€¢ Chat ID
  â€¢ Usage statistics (e.g. commands)

ğŸ”¹ *Purpose of processing:*
  â€¢ Bot operation & functionality
  â€¢ Statistical analysis

ğŸ”¹ *Rights of data subjects:*
  1. Information about stored data
  2. Correction of incorrect data
  3. Deletion (â€œright to be forgottenâ€)
  4. Restriction of processing
  5. Objection to data processing
  6. Data portability

ğŸ”¹ *Storage duration:*
  Data is deleted when no longer needed or upon request.

ğŸ”¹ *Security:*
  â€¢ Encrypted transmission (TLS)
  â€¢ Servers in the EU, protected against unauthorized access

ğŸ”¹ *Contact & complaints:*
  â€¢ E-Mail: sebloidl12@gmail.com

{language_hint}

_More details:_
`!dsgvo info`

migrate_private_only: Please run the registration in a private chat with the bot (no group chat).
migrate_info:
ğŸ“¦ *Migration of your old bot data*

If you used the bot before (before the big update), you can transfer your old data here.

*ğŸ”„ How does it work?*
â€¢ Just type *!migrate*
â€¢ The bot searches for your old data (serial number)
â€¢ If found, it will be imported into the new database

*â—Important:*
â€¢ Only works via WhatsApp
â€¢ If you are already registered, nothing will happen
â€¢ Your old data will remain unchanged

Use *!migrate* now to import your old data.
